body_html:
Latest commit supports passing Generator objects through these methods;

This involves changing THPGenerator to have an at::Generator rather than a THGenerator.
TH getRNGState, setRNGState are still called directly because they are not bound from ATen yet;
they should probably be on the Generators and return (opaque) GenerateState objects rather than being bound through Tensor.

Also, THPGenerator_TH_CData is kind of an ugly looking macro but should go away once we want getRNGstate, setRNGState and merge Variable and Tensor. LMK if you have a better name for it.
